QuestData.Title: We Need An Outpost
QuestData.Description: Commander, we've gathered enough materials to build an outpost that will support our mission against the Iron Horde.$b$bHow shall we proceed?$b$bA lumber yard would be valuable for gathering resources in the dense overgrowth to the south, and in confronting the plant monstrosities that defend it.$b$bOn the other hand, a sparring arena would provide us the brutish forces we'd need to push through the magnaron wastelands to the north.$b$bWhen you're ready, make your choice on the table.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Drafting Table to craft a Lumber Yard or a Sparring Arena.
QuestData.CompletionText: Buildin' an outpost out here requires a certain kind o' crazy.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, that is one thing ta pick. Tell you what, you get this building up and running at full steam and I'll see if I can't adapt these blueprints to work for the space in your garrison.
